author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...COSME COULD STILL BECOME A HURRICANE OVERNIGHT BEFORE WEAKENING BEGINS LATER ON TUESDAY...
summary: ...COSME COULD STILL BECOME A HURRICANE OVERNIGHT BEFORE WEAKENING BEGINS LATER ON TUESDAY... As of 8:00 PM MST Mon Jun 09 the center of Cosme was located near 15.2, -114.2 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 992 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...COSME COULD STILL BECOME A HURRICANE OVERNIGHT BEFORE WEAKENING BEGINS LATER ON TUESDAY... As of 8:00 PM MST Mon Jun 09 the center of Cosme was located near 15.2, -114.2 with movement NW at 3 mph. The minimum central pressure was 992 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 70 mph.

title: Summary for Tropical Storm Cosme (EP3/EP032025)
